Detailed Description

A stream containing raw sound data and information about the format.

bool Mangle::Sound::SampleSource::eof (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Returns true if the stream is empty. Required for readable streams.

Reimplemented from Mangle::Stream::Stream.

Reimplemented in Mangle::Sound::Stream2Samples, and Mangle::Sound::WavSource.

int32_t *  channels,
int32_t *  bits 
) [pure virtual]

Get the sample rate, number of channels, and bits per sample. NULL parameters are ignored.

void Mangle::Sound::SampleSource::seek ( size_t  pos  )  [inline, virtual]

Seek to an absolute position in this stream. Not all streams are seekable.

Reimplemented from Mangle::Stream::Stream.

Reimplemented in Mangle::Sound::AudiereSource, Mangle::Sound::Stream2Samples, and Mangle::Sound::WavSource.

size_t Mangle::Sound::SampleSource::size (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return the total size of the stream. For streams hasSize is false, size() should fail in some way, since it is an error to call it in those cases.

Reimplemented from Mangle::Stream::Stream.

Reimplemented in Mangle::Sound::AudiereSource, Mangle::Sound::Stream2Samples, and Mangle::Sound::WavSource.

size_t Mangle::Sound::SampleSource::tell (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Get the current position in the stream. Non-seekable streams are not required to keep track of this.

Reimplemented from Mangle::Stream::Stream.

Reimplemented in Mangle::Sound::AudiereSource, Mangle::Sound::Stream2Samples, and Mangle::Sound::WavSource.
